summary:
Overall Importance: 8

The changes reflect a focused enhancement of the website's messaging and design to highlight their AI product, 'Genie,' which targets busy parents, especially moms.

Homepage Updates

Title and Meta Description

The title was changed from "Gather builds AI for busy humans" to "Gather builds AI for busy humans" to emphasize AI's utility.

Updated meta description now reads: "Meet Genie, a next-gen life assistant for women & parents" — highlighting the target audience for their AI product.

Hero Section

Old headline: "AI for busy humans" has been replaced with

This slight change maintains the message but refines the visual style.

Description updated from:

"Gather is on a mission to build AI that makes humans’ lives easier. Genie is Gather’s first product, a life assistant designed especially for moms."

New Imagery

The image previously found at https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66192801745e3601260dc299/661ca48205c900f7a61356d8_Social%20share%20image.png has been updated to a more professional version, keeping the same image link which ensures better social media sharing previews.

Nav Links

Updated navigation includes critical links now: About, Join us.

Feature Descriptions

The "What makes Genie special" section was notably updated:

Key Features

Old: "Genie helps you download a copy of your data from every major B2C service you use... proactive... you best... day 0...

New:
  • Genie knows you best
  • Genie is proactive
  • Personal and private
  • Works on Day 0

Call to Action

New call-to-action button with link: Get the iOS app

Footer Description and Links

The footer has been modified to include more links and social media profiles:

  • Blog
  • Jobs
  • Refer someone
  • Videos
  • Events
  • Privacy Policy
  • Contact
  • LinkedIn
  • Twitter
  • Youtube
